subject: Re: [junit] Problems running automated tests of TestFirstDesigned GUI
msgSnippet: ... Greg Sorry man I quoted the wrong thing to you.  The virtual Greg frame buffer software I was talking about is called Xvfb and Greg maybe you could find
messageBody:
>>>>> "Greg" == Greg Stickley <gregstickley@...> writes:

Greg> Sorry man I quoted the wrong thing to you. The virtual
Greg> frame buffer software I was talking about is called Xvfb and
Greg> maybe you could find some info about it here
Greg> http://www.xfree86.org/4.0.2/Xvfb.1.html

I'll go check that out, Greg. Thanks a lot. I also went back and
looked at my build script. Then I took out the line that unset the
DISPLAY variable, and magically everything worked :) The only problem
is that I have to be root to start the X server remotely, since I
don't have ownership of the console. I'm going to try the frame buffer
thing to see if that gets me past this. Otherwise, I'm just going to
set up that machine to run Xdm, and not worry about it.

Thanks again for your help,

bab

--
Brian Button bbutton@...

St. Louis, MO http://www.objectmentor.com
